channel.title: Warehouse on Sanchit's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Warehouse on Sanchit's blog

item.title: Overview of Amazon Modern Data Redshift Warehouse
item.description: Overview of Amazon Modern Data Redshift Warehouse Overview Amazon Redshift uses SQL to analyze structured and semi-structured data across data warehouses, operational databases, and data lakes, using AWS-designed hardware and machine learning to deliver the best price performance at any scale. This session will provide an overview of Amazon Redshift like overview, architecture, distribution keys and sort keys, Redshift spectrum, Advance feature, etc. It is hosted by AWS UserGroup Mumbai to spread the knowledge of Amazon Modern Data Redshift Warehouse
